lexUnit.name: summarize.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: give a discription of the main point(s) of something.

sentence.text: This influence can be summarised in diagrammatic form , as shown in figure 15.1 .

Bower and Ackerman 's findings may be summarized in the form of figure 7.1 , which shows that most investment proposals of any scale or significance are identified at the level of the product line or department .
In the previous two chapters I have summarized two contemporary analyses of science that differ in fundamental respects .
The information required to calculate the mean bond enthalpy for CH can be summarised in an enthalpy diagram ( see figure 5.13 ) .
We have discussed ` cooperation " by implication in our study of conflict , but we will summarise its nature briefly here .
This final section summarizes the grammar points presented in each unit , and provides diagrammatic ` grammar trees " of the key sentence structures .

The relationship between use of linguistic variables and various other speaker characteristics is illustrated in table 5.2 , which summarizes patterns in the realization of the vowel variable ( ai ) by Belfast working-class speakers .

The worldwide progress in using vibration to aid understanding speech was summarized in 1974 by Kirkman .
Reflective thinking can perhaps be summarized by a quotation from the philosopher Basil Mitchell .
The evidence for this is summarized by Jennifer Coates .
The declared aims of the US response were summarized by Bush in a televised address on Aug. 8 .

Since , however , cases concerning property which has devolved according to those provisions will for many years continue to come before the courts , they are summarized in a note at the end of the book .
In our first Report on the primary stages we included an early chapter which tried to summarise our views with simple eloquence .
Key results are summarised in the table of location decisions .
The committee secretary summarises all comments from DTACs and prepares a draft response for inclusion in the TAC agenda .

In an attempt to assess the possibility of using citation counts as a measure of research quality , Lindsey has summarised the significance of citation counts in scientometric studies :
The following paragraphs and the schedule attached to this letter summarize your main conditions of service as they will apply in relation to this appointment .
